00021 class COB {
00022     private $format;
00023     private $blocks;
00024     
00037     public function COB(IReader $reader=null) {
00038         if($reader != null) {
00039             $this->LoadCOB($reader);
00040         }
00041     }
00048     private function LoadCOB(IReader $reader) {
00049         if($reader->Read(4) == 'cob2') {
00050             $reader->Seek(0);
00051             $this->LoadC2COB($reader);
00052         } else {
00053             $string = $reader->GetSubString(0);
00054             $data = @gzuncompress($string);
00055             if($data===false) {
00056                 $reader->Seek(0);
00057                 $this->LoadC1COB($reader);
00058             } else {
00059                 $this->LoadC2COB(new StringReader($data));
00060             }
00061         }
00062     }
00068     public function LoadC2COB(IReader $reader) {
00069         $this->format = COB_FORMAT_C2;
00070         if($reader->Read(4) == 'cob2') {
00071             while($block = $this->ReadBlock($reader)) {
00072                 $this->blocks[] = $block;
00073             }
00074         } else {
00075             throw new Exception('Not a valid C2 COB file!');
00076         }
00077     }
00083     public function LoadC1COB(IReader $reader) {
00084         $this->format = COB_FORMAT_C1;
00085         $version = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00086         if($version > 4) {
00087             throw new Exception('Invalid cob file.');
00088         } else {
00089             $this->blocks[] = COBAgentBlock::CreateFromReaderC1($reader);
00090         }
00091     }
00095     public function AddBlock(COBBlock $block) {
00096         //TODO: Check that this block works for this COB type?
00097         $this->blocks[] = $block;
00098     }
00103     private function ReadBlock($reader) {
00104         if(!($type = $reader->Read(4))) {
00105             print($type);
00106             return false;
00107         }
00108         $size = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00109         switch($type) {
00110             case 'agnt':
00111                 //we read the entire thing so that if there are errors we can still go on with the other blocks.
00112                 return COBAgentBlock::CreateFromReaderC2($reader);
00113                 break;
00114             case 'auth':
00115                 return COBAuthorBlock::CreateFromReader(new StringReader($reader->Read($size)));
00116                 break;
00117             case 'file':
00118                 return COBFileBlock::CreateFromReader(new StringReader($reader->Read($size)));
00119                 break;
00120             default:
00121                 //throw new Exception('Invalid block type: Probably a bug or an invalid COB file: '.$type);
00122                 //simply ignore unknown block types, in case people add their own
00123                 return new COBUnknownBlock($type,$reader->Read($size));
00124                 break;
00125         }
00126     }
00134     public function GetBlocks($type=false) {
00135         $blocks = array();
00136         foreach($this->blocks as $block) {
00137             if($type === false || $type == $block->GetType()) {
00138                 $blocks[] = $block;
00139             }
00140         }
00141         return $blocks;
00142     }
00143   
00147   public function Compile($format = null) {
00148     if($format == null) {
00149       $format = $this->GetType();
00150     }
00151     if($format != FORMAT_C1) {
00152       $format = FORMAT_C2
00153     }
00154     switch($format) {
00155       case FORMAT_C1:
00156         $this->CompileC1();
00157       case FORMAT_C2:
00158         $this->CompileC2();
00159       default:
00160         throw new Exception('Non-understood COB format - sorry!');
00161     }
00162   }

00164    throw new Exception('C1 COB Compilation not yet ready.')
00165   }

00167     $data = ''; // DRUNK: IS THIS EVEN RIGHT
